mapper.select: select reservation_id, car_id, rental_location, rental_datetime, return_location, return_datetime FROM fast_reservation
select reservation_id, car_id, rental_location, rental_datetime, return_location, return_datetime FROM fast_reservation WHERE reservation_id=#{reservationId};
SELECT c.* FROM car c JOIN parking p ON c.rental_station = p.parking_id WHERE p.parking_district = '수원시';

SELECT c.car_id, c.car_year, c.car_fuel, c.car_grade, c.car_options, m.model_id, m.model_brand, m.model_name, m.model_category, m.model_amount_hour, m.model_amount_day, m.model_seate_num, m.model_transmission, p.parking_id, p.parking_name, p.parking_address FROM car c JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id JOIN parking rp ON c.rental_station = rp.parking_id -- 차량의 현재 주차장 정보 가져오기 JOIN parking p ON p.parking_province = rp.parking_province AND p.parking_district = rp.parking_district -- 같은 지역의 모든 주차장 가져오기 WHERE c.car_id = #{carId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fast_reservation (car_id, rental_location, rental_datetime, return_location, return_datetime, user_num) VALUES (#{carId},#{rentalLocation},#{rentalDatetime},#{returnLocation},#{returnDatetime},#{userNum});
mapper.select: SELECT m.model_amount_hour FROM car c JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id -- 차량 모델 정보 조회 WHERE car_id=#{carId};
SELECT m.model_amount_day FROM car c JOIN model m ON c.model_id = m.model_id -- 차량 모델 정보 조회 WHERE car_id=#{carId};
